title: Citibank Hungary Launches Unique CitiPlanner in Support of its World-Class CitigoldWealth Management Proposition
summary: Budapest - Citibank Hungary has introduced CitiPlanner, a new technology-based analysis tool that revolutionizes its world-class Citigold Wealth Management proposition. This innovative tool will support the highly skilled Citigold personal bankers in setting up and managing the individual investment portfolios of Citigold customers. The personal bankers will build on the client profile that is designed to assess the risk profile, financial capabilities, lifestyle needs and financial goals of each customer.
tag-1: Citibank Hungary Launches Unique CitiPlanner in Support of its World-Class CitigoldWealth Management Proposition
tag-2: Budapest – Citibank Hungary has introduced CitiPlanner, a new technology-based analysis tool that revolutionizes its world-class Citigold Wealth Management proposition. This innovative tool will support the highly skilled Citigold personal bankers in setting up and managing the individual investment portfolios of Citigold customers. The personal bankers will build on the client profile that is designed to assess the risk profile, financial capabilities, lifestyle needs and financial goals of each customer.
tag-3: Batara Sianturi, Citi Country Officer for Hungary, said: "Leveraging Citi's unmatched global network and 200 years of experience, we are offering a compelling wealth-management proposition to our Citigold customers in Hungary. This consists of impressive Citibank products and the products of our global partners. In addition to continuously enhancing our product proposition, we are always looking at ways to improve the quality of our service by building on our global innovation capabilities to demonstrate significant value to our customers. CitiPlanner is clearly a unique tool that will help us enhance the customer experience and wealth management efficiency."
tag-4: Jon Wiggins, Consumer Business Manager for Hungary, also remarked: "A highly skilled and knowledgeable personal banker and the right wealth-management process make up the core of a winning investment strategy. We have the right team and tools in place to offer our Citigold customers solutions that best meet their needs and goals. With this revolutionary analysis tool we are making the client-profile process faster, very easy to follow and transparent to our customers, with portfolio creation and management also becoming easier and more convenient."
tag-5: Citigold is Citibank's premium banking service providing outstanding investment and banking solutions, a personal relationship approach and exclusive privileges through the Citigold Club and Culinaria Dining Program. In addition, in partnership with Citi International Personal Bank, Citibank offers international brokerage services, including trading equities and bonds in 25 major countries, access to more than 200 global mutual funds across all sector and asset classes, and time deposits with competitive interest rates in 12 currencies.
tag-6: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
